Class Item ¶

Synopsis

Attributes
count

integer The amount of items in this stack
location

integer dont touch this dont guess it use it when referencing an item to client functions
id

integer The runtime numerical identifier of the item, will change often use for runtime only
blockid

integer The runtime numerical identifier of the block assosiated with the item, will change often use for runtime only
name

string The name of the item ex: diamond_sword
blockname

string The name of the block assosiated with the item ex: carrots
maxStackCount

integer The maximum amount of this item that can be stacked
maxDamage

integer The maximum durability of an item
durability

integer The amount of damage applied to that item
data

integer The data of the item, like in /give with dye and things like that
customName

string The name (ex: from anvils)
enchant

Enchants[]
Item.count ¶

integer The amount of items in this stack

Item.location ¶

integer dont touch this dont guess it use it when referencing an item to client functions

Item.id ¶

integer The runtime numerical identifier of the item, will change often use for runtime only

Item.blockid ¶

integer The runtime numerical identifier of the block assosiated with the item, will change often use for runtime only

Item.name ¶

string The name of the item ex: diamond_sword

Item.blockname ¶

string The name of the block assosiated with the item ex: carrots

Item.maxStackCount ¶

integer The maximum amount of this item that can be stacked

Item.maxDamage ¶

integer The maximum durability of an item

Item.durability ¶

integer The amount of damage applied to that item

Item.data ¶

integer The data of the item, like in /give with dye and things like that

Item.customName ¶

string The name (ex: from anvils)
